bibl.title: An Account.
bibl.note: From a private collection deposited in the Museum of the Faculty of Archaeology, Cairo University, under: Sedment (1996), 175-5. A. - List of names grouped under villages of the Arsinoite nome. Against each name, an amount (in artabae?). Heracleopolis Magna, IIIrd cent. B.C. (?).
bibl.seg: EL-ASHIRY Mohamed and Mohamed KASHAF, An Account.
